title: League Fan Art Spotlight - AHRI

embed.description: DOWNLOAD on DA: http://fav.me/d8kc0p2 Watch the FULL Process here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lrVqNXdRysg

body:
For those of you who have missed the art spotlights, I made one for you! Also I thought it was a bummer we never did one for the OG Ahri.

DOWNLOAD the finished picture on DA: http://fav.me/d8kc0p2

See the slowed down (plus COMMENTARY) process all on YouTube: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLb0T1WxEbeAIX__krnmGiqEY7WJAYsvEX

Thank you to everyone who watched this come together, was a real treat to make for you : )

-KNKL Knockmaw
